Text.Page:
There was a time I happily made starling nestcapsâ€”but then they got so popular that everyone wanted one.

Problem is, making one requires a vale starling egg, and all those hat-hunters snatched up every last one.

No more eggs, no more starlings. And no more hats."You mean an egg like this?"

You've got a starling egg? Well, um, it'd be a shame to waste it...

Okay, what color starling works best with your armor?"Let's see..."
The Hyderad Legacy used to import starling eggs, but that business just dried up when the starlings died out. You'll never find one.
